channel.title: yak-shaving on Mark Needham
channel.description: Recent content in yak-shaving on Mark Needham

item.title: Yak Shaving: Tracking the yak stack
item.description: While I’ve been learning how to write an android application there’s been plenty of opportunities for me to go off shaving yaks, it’s pretty much Yakville Central. Typically I’d end up spending hours trying to work out some obscure thing which I didn’t really need to know so I wanted to try and avoid that this time. I started keeping a track of the 'yak stack' which I was currently following and mentally noting exactly where I was up to.
